name: The DawnSeekers
description:
The Dawnseekers is a mobile game with a similar gameplay as Vampire Survivor. In ancient Egypt, the solar boat of Ra is overturned during the night, plunging the world into an imperishable night. Different Egyptian gods will then help each other and defeat hordes of enemies. The armies of Apophis will do anything to prevent you from bringing the Sun back to life.

The USP is the use of the Hieroglyphs: the player can set up to five Hieroglyphs to get various power ups. Since hieroglyphs each have their own meaning, combining some of them will give the player powerful additional bonuses. It's up to the player to find the combinations and experiment with different gameplay guided by these power ups.

|

How to play:

Only mouse.
You just need to move your character, all shots are automatic.
Kill enemies and collect souls to level up.
Double click on the screen when your character is on a pressure plate to trigger the traps.

|

Our 2 months team:

Director artist: Mathias Jouffre
2D/UI artist: Marie Najean
Character artist: Hugo Mathieu
Character artist: Margaux Fleur-Bontout
Producer/Dev: Maxence Rerat
Lead GD/Dev: Alexandre Chateau
Game designer: Alexandre Mitranescu
Lead level designer: Kilyan Fernandez
Level designer: Thibaud Bailly
Narrative designer: Charles de Launay

PS: The game music is Kingdom of Nasrad from Skies of Arcadia (game by Overworks, 2000)
